node.title: 3. Fanning the Blaze
node.description: 3/4: Fanning the Blaze - Light Unshackled Light Unshackled is an on-location documentary on the Protestant Reformation. It contains stunning footage and powerful stories of the heroes of the Protestant Reformation who shaped the course of history forever. Join speaker Phil Mills, Jr., as we travel through 11 countries to share these inspiring stories.http://www.lightunshackled.com
